src:
Macan Kemayoran Bungkam Laskar Padjajaran
03 Nov 2019, 18:22 by Anggi Tiar


Macan Kemayoran Bungkam Laskar Padjajaran

KBRN, Bekasi : Persija Jakarta berhasil meraih kemenangan pada laga lanjutan Liga 1 Indonesia. Tim berjuluk Macan Kemayoran itu berhasil membungkam PS Tira Persikabo. Dalam pertandingan yang berlangsung di Stadion, Patriot Chandrabaga, Bekasi, Jawa Barat, Minggu (3/11/2019) sore WIB, Ismed Sofyan dan kawan-kawan sukses mengalahkan Laskar Padjajaran -julukan Tira Kabo- dengan dua gol tanpa balas alias 2-0. Meski tampil agresif sejak babak pertama dimulai, namun Persija terlihat kesulitan untuk mencetak gol di paruh pertama tersebut. Akhirnya, hingga turun minum skor kaca mata atau 0-0 tetap bertahan. Namun tujuh menit usai jeda, suporter yang memenuhi tribun penonton Stadion Patriot bergemuruh. Hal itu lantaran, Persija berhasil mencetak gol ke gawang Tira Kabo yang dikawal, Angga Saputro. Tepatnya di menit ke-52, gol itu dicetak oleh Alexandre Luiz Reame. Berawal dari umpan silang yang dilepaskan Heri Susanto dari sepak pojok mampu dimaksimalkan dengan pemain yang akrab disapa Xandao itu untuk merobek jala gawang Tira Kabo. Tim kebanggaan masyarakat Ibu Kota itu memperbesar keunggulan pada menit ke-72. Kali ini, Marko Simic yang mencatatkan namanya di papan skor usai tandukkannya menyambut umpan matang Heri Susanto kembali memaksa Angga Saputro memungut si kulit bundar dari dalam gawangnya. Tertinggal dua gol, tak membuat Tira-Kabo berdiam diri. Salah satu tim kebanggaan masyarakat Jawa Barat itu terus mencoba untuk memperkecil ketertingalannya. Tira-Kabo sempat mendapatka hadiah penalti, usai pemain tuan rumah melakukan pelanggaran handball di dalam kotak terlarang. Sayangnya, Ciro Alves yang menajdi eksekutor gagal memanfaatakn peluang tersebut, sepakanya masih mampu dihalau Andritany Ardhiyasa. Skor 2-0 untuk kemenangan tuan rumah bertahan hingga laga usai. Dengan kemenangan ini, Persija kini naik satu peringkat ke posisi 14 klasemen sementara dengan 27 poin dari 24 pertandingan. Sedangkan, Tira Persikabo masih bertahan di posisi ketujuh dengan 37 poin dari 26 laga. Susunan pemain:Persija Jakarta: Andritany Ardhiyasa; Tony Sucipto, Fachrudin Aryanto, Ryuji Utomo, Xandao; Novri Setiawan, Rohit Chand, Rachmad Hidayat, Joan Campasol; Heri Susanto, Marko Simic.PS Tira Persikabo: Angga Saputro; Rifa Marasabessy, Zoubairou Garba, Khurshed Beknazarov, Abduh Lestaluhu; Guntur Triaji, Roni Sugeng, Louis Parfait; Osas Saha, Wawan Febriyanto, Ciro Alves.
text:
Tigers Kemayoran Mute Laskar Padjajaran
Nov 03 2019, 18:22 by Anggi Tiar


Tigers Kemayoran Mute Laskar Padjajaran

KBRN, Bekasi: Persija Jakarta won the League 1 continued match in Indonesia. The team nicknamed the Kemayoran Tiger succeeded in silencing PS Tira Persikabo. In a match that took place at the Stadium, Patriot Chandrabaga, Bekasi, West Java, Sunday (3/11/2019) afternoon WIB, Ismed Sofyan and his friends successfully defeated Laskar Padjajaran - nicknamed Tira Kabo - with two goals without reply alias 2-0 . Although appearing aggressive since the first round began, but Persija looked difficult to score a goal in the first half. Finally, until halftime glasses score or 0-0 persist. But seven minutes after the break, supporters who filled the stands of the Patriot Stadium roared. That was because, Persija managed to score against Tira Kabo who was escorted, Angga Saputro. Precisely in the 52nd minute, the goal was scored by Alexandre Luiz Reame. Starting from a cross that was released by Heri Susanto from a corner football can be maximized with the player who is familiarly called Xandao was to tear the net goalkeeper Tira Kabo. The pride of the Capital City team increased the advantage in the 72nd minute. This time, Marko Simic, who listed his name on the scoreboard after his header, welcomed Heri Susanto's ripe pass again, forced Angga Saputro to pick up the round skin from the net. Left behind two goals, does not make Tira-Kabo silent. One of the pride teams in West Java community continues to try to minimize the gap. Tira-Kabo had a penalty, after the host player violated the handball in the forbidden box. Unfortunately, Ciro Alves, who became the executor, failed to take advantage of the opportunity, and he was still able to be driven by Andritany Ardhiyasa. Score 2-0 to win the host last until the fight was over. With this victory, Persija has now moved up one place to 14th in the standings with 27 points from 24 matches. Meanwhile, Tira Persikabo still holds seventh position with 37 points from 26 matches. The composition of players: Persija Jakarta: Andritany Ardhiyasa; Tony Sucipto, Fachrudin Aryanto, Ryuji Utomo, Xandao; Novri Setiawan, Rohit Chand, Rachmad Hidayat, Joan Campasol; Heri Susanto, Marko Simic. PS Tira Persikabo: Angga Saputro; Rifa Marasabessy, Zoubairou Garba, Khurshed Beknazarov, Abduh Lestaluhu; Guntur Triaji, Roni Sugeng, Louis Parfait; Osas Saha, Wawan Febriyanto, Ciro Alves.
